decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.  Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:   Site Location plan 1:1250, Block Plan 1:200 and 10104973 received on 17th May 2011.  Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning. | The approved public call boxes shall be removed from the site and the land made good to the satisfaction of the local planning authority when it becomes redundant.   Reason:  To prevent unnecessary clutter in the area in the interest of the appearance of the locality in accordance with Policies 4.1 of the adopted Ealing Unitary Development Plan 'Plan for the Environment' (2004).
description: Replacement freestanding public telephone kiosk incorporating internally illuminated advertisement (Application for Prior Approval of Siting and Appearance under Part 24, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order (1995 as amended)
